channel.title: SOMEONE PLEASE HELP! Local host connection problem
channel.description: Okay, I have the Client's IP set to 127.0.0.1...and it's still not letting me connect to server. I run the Source, Load the client, but when I try to login it says Error connecting to server. Someone please help, I want to connect locally so I am only player online so I can make server how I want it. PLEASE REPLY FAST!

item.title: SOMEONE PLEASE HELP! Local host connection problem
item.dc:creator: @Blu-Ray Blu-Ray
item.description:
@Blu-Ray wrote:

ok try editing the run.bat file is the JDK correct

Read full topic

item.title: SOMEONE PLEASE HELP! Local host connection problem
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

Okay, I have the Client’s IP set to 127.0.0.1…and it’s still not letting me connect to server.
I run the Source, Load the client, but when I try to login it says Error connecting to server.
Someone please help, I want to connect locally so I am only player online so I can make server how I want it.
PLEASE REPLY FAST!
